title: When a police officer stops a driver
context: Talk to a cop after getting pulled over for speeding.

content.bestLine: I understand I was speeding, officer.

neutral.text: What seems to be the issue?
I wasn't aware of the speed limit.
Can I see your badge, please?

formal.text: I was not aware of the speed limit in this area.
May I request your badge number?
I am willing to accept a warning or citation.
Please advise me on the proper procedure.

patterns.template: I was [options] when I got pulled over.
Can you [options] my license and registration?
patterns.meaning: requesting the officer to review documents

dialogs.description: A driver gets pulled over for speeding and has a neutral conversation with the police officer.

lines.speaker: Driver
lines.text: What seems to be the issue?

lines.speaker: Police Officer
lines.text: You were speeding, sir. License and registration, please.

dialogs.description: A driver gets pulled over for speeding and has a formal conversation with the police officer.

lines.speaker: Police Officer
lines.text: You were doing 80 in a 55 zone. Can I see your license and registration?
